a34d9c11-4814-4cc8-b19b-a9fbd9f118e0.name: Iphone 15
a34d9c11-4814-4cc8-b19b-a9fbd9f118e0.imageAlt: Tall slender porcelain bottle with natural clay textured body and cork stopper.
a34d9c11-4814-4cc8-b19b-a9fbd9f118e0.details: The iPhone 15 represents the latest innovation from Apple, combining cutting-edge technology with sleek design. It continues the legacy of its predecessors with enhanced performance, camera capabilities, and user experience.

b61c48a7-a962-4926-9598-92016af148c1.name: Nomad Tumbler
b61c48a7-a962-4926-9598-92016af148c1.imageAlt: Olive drab green insulated bottle with flared screw lid and flat top.
b61c48a7-a962-4926-9598-92016af148c1.details: The Nomad Tumbler is a premium, travel-friendly beverage container designed for those on the go. It combines rugged durability with modern aesthetics, perfect for both urban and outdoor adventures.

d8a609b4-e313-4dd2-a2b0-5de775e880bc.name: Focus Paper Refill
d8a609b4-e313-4dd2-a2b0-5de775e880bc.imageAlt: Person using a pen to cross a task off a productivity paper card.
d8a609b4-e313-4dd2-a2b0-5de775e880bc.details: The Focus Paper Refill is designed for the Focus Planner, providing high-quality, premium paper for those who value organization and productivity.

381a98cb-d616-4b6c-af9e-3b313a626b8f.name: Machined Mechanical Pencil
381a98cb-d616-4b6c-af9e-3b313a626b8f.imageAlt: Hand holding black machined steel mechanical pencil with brass tip and top.
381a98cb-d616-4b6c-af9e-3b313a626b8f.details: The Machined Mechanical Pencil is a precision writing instrument, crafted for professionals and enthusiasts who appreciate fine engineering and durability.

c5d23e33-6302-4ff9-927b-85ed0a3e5fa5.name: Iphone 14 Pro
c5d23e33-6302-4ff9-927b-85ed0a3e5fa5.details: The iPhone 14 Pro is a high-performance smartphone from Apple, offering a robust set of features aimed at providing an exceptional user experience, particularly for photography enthusiasts and power users.
